type:
∀ {m : Int} {a : (Subtype fun n => GE.ge n m) → Real}
  (claim0 :
    ∀ {N : Int} (hN : GE.ge N m),
      Eq ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial (instHAdd.hAdd N 1))
        (instHAdd.hAdd ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial N)
          (instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) (instHAdd.hAdd N 1)) (a ⟨instHAdd.hAdd N 1, ⋯⟩))))
  (claim1 :
    ∀ {N : Int} (hN : GE.ge N m),
      Eq ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial (instHAdd.hAdd N 2))
        (instHAdd.hAdd ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial N)
          (instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) (instHAdd.hAdd N 1))
            (instHSub.hSub (a ⟨instHAdd.hAdd N 1, ⋯⟩) (a ⟨instHAdd.hAdd N 2, ⋯⟩)))))
  (claim2 :
    ∀ {N : Int},
      GE.ge N m →
        Odd N →
          GE.ge
            ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial (instHAdd.hAdd N 2))
            ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial N))
  (claim3 :
    ∀ {N : Int},
      GE.ge N m →
        Even N →
          Real.instLE.le
            ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial (instHAdd.hAdd N 2))
            ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial N))
  (why1 :
    ∀ {N : Int},
      GE.ge N m →
        Even N →
          ∀ (k : Nat),
            Real.instLE.le
              ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial
                (instHAdd.hAdd N (instHMul.hMul 2 k.cast)))
              ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial N)),
  (∀ {N : Int} (hN : GE.ge N m) (h' : Even N) (k : Nat),
      GE.ge
        ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial
          (instHAdd.hAdd (instHAdd.hAdd N (instHMul.hMul 2 k.cast)) 1))
        (instHSub.hSub ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial N)
          (a ⟨instHAdd.hAdd N 1, ⋯⟩))) →
    (∀ {N : Int},
        GE.ge N m →
          Even N →
            ∀ (k : Nat),
              Real.instLE.le
                ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial
                  (instHAdd.hAdd (instHAdd.hAdd N (instHMul.hMul 2 k.cast)) 1))
                ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial
                  (instHAdd.hAdd N (instHMul.hMul 2 k.cast)))) →
      ∀ {N : Int}, GE.ge N m → Even N → ∀ (k : Nat), GE.ge (instHAdd.hAdd N 1) m

∀ {m : Int} {a : (Subtype fun n => Int.instLEInt.le m n) → Real}
  (claim0 :
    ∀ {N : Int} (hN : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) N)) 0),
      Eq
        ((Finset.Icc m (instHAdd.hAdd N 1)).sum fun x =>
          if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
            instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
          else 0)
        (instHAdd.hAdd
          ((Finset.Icc m N).sum fun x =>
            if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
              instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
            else 0)
          (instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) (instHAdd.hAdd N 1)) (a ⟨instHAdd.hAdd N 1, ⋯⟩)))),
  (∀ {N : Int} (hN : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) N)) 0),
      Eq
        ((Finset.Icc m (instHAdd.hAdd N 2)).sum fun x =>
          if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
            instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
          else 0)
        (instHAdd.hAdd
          ((Finset.Icc m N).sum fun x =>
            if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
              instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
            else 0)
          (instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) (instHAdd.hAdd N 1))
            (instHSub.hSub (a ⟨instHAdd.hAdd N 1, ⋯⟩) (a ⟨instHAdd.hAdd N 2, ⋯⟩))))) →
    (∀ {N : Int},
        Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) N)) 0 →
          Odd N →
            Real.instLE.le
              ((Finset.Icc m N).sum fun x =>
                if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
                  instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
                else 0)
              ((Finset.Icc m (instHAdd.hAdd N 2)).sum fun x =>
                if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
                  instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
                else 0)) →
      (∀ {N : Int},
          Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) N)) 0 →
            Even N →
              Real.instLE.le
                ((Finset.Icc m (instHAdd.hAdd N 2)).sum fun x =>
                  if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
                    instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
                  else 0)
                ((Finset.Icc m N).sum fun x =>
                  if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
                    instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
                  else 0)) →
        (∀ {N : Int},
            Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) N)) 0 →
              Even N →
                ∀ (k : Nat),
                  Real.instLE.le
                    ((Finset.Icc m (instHAdd.hAdd N (instHMul.hMul 2 (instNatCastInt.natCast k)))).sum fun x =>
                      if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
                        instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
                      else 0)
                    ((Finset.Icc m N).sum fun x =>
                      if h : Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) x)) 0 then
                        instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) x) (a ⟨x, ⋯⟩)
                      else 0)) →
          ∀ {N : Int},
            Int.instLEInt.le (instHAdd.hAdd m (instHMul.hMul (-1) N)) 0 →
              Even N → ∀ (k : Nat), GE.ge (instHAdd.hAdd N 1) m

  (claim0 :

  (why2 :

        ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial

        (instHSub.hSub ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial N)

  (why3 :

              ((Chapter7.Series.mk' fun n => instHMul.hMul (instHPow.hPow (-1) n.val) (a n)).partial
